items.title: Introduction to Scalability
items.content:
# Introduction to Scalability

Scalability refers to the capability of a system to handle growing amounts of work by adding resources to the system.

items.title: Horizontal vs Vertical Scaling
items.content:
# Horizontal vs Vertical Scaling

**Vertical Scaling**: Adding more power to an existing machine.

**Horizontal Scaling**: Adding more machines to your resource pool.
